descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 30 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
# **Welcome to the Skies: Where Flow, Focus, and Speed Collide**

Easy to learn but difficult to master, this game will challenge you to prove yourself the best surfer in the sky. Strap on your wings and take off!

# **Floor is Lava**

The closer to the ground you dare to fly, the more speed you will gain. But a single touch will end your run! Can you handle flying mere centimeters away from crashing catastrophically and top the leaderboards?

[media]

# **Features**

🪽 **Surf the Skies** – Glide through narrow tracks and feel your speed surge as you fly dangerously to terrain.

🎯 **Pure Skill** – Mastery comes from precision and timing. How good can you become?

👻 **Race Your Ghost** – Compete against your best time and refine your path run after run.

🌍 **Online Leaderboards** – Post your scores and see how you rank against players and friends.

💨 **Intense Sessions** – Perfect for quick flights or long sessions chasing perfection.

# **Campaign**

Compete across 24 carefully designed tracks as you progress through the campaign. These tracks will slowly build up your skill, offering a variety of challenges along the way. Tracks come in different modes:

🏁 **Race to the Finish Line** – Reach the finish line as fast as possible!

⭕ **Collect the Rings** – Fly through all the rings in any order you like. Find the best path!


# **Hidden Collectibles**

Find dozens of hidden collectibles scattered thorughout the game. Explore the racing tracks and re-discover them from a different perspective. The main menu also offers a large open area to fly around and relax in.

[media]
